Translations.Text: he adamana santano! Sum mem tamari pasethi vacana na lidhum hatum? Ke tame setanani bandagi na karaso, te tamaro khullo satru che
ane mari ja bandagi karajo, satya marga a ja che
setane tamara manthi ghana lokone pathabhrasta kari didha, sum tame samajata nathi
a ja te jahannama che, jenum vacana tamane apavamam avatu hatum
potana inkarano badalo melavava mate aje amam dakhala tha'i java
ame ajana divase temana modha upara mahora lagavi da'isum ane temana hatha amari sathe vata-cita karase ane temana paga saksi apase, te karyoni, je te'o karata hatam
Jo ame icchata to temane drstihina kari deta, pachi a loko marga melavava mate bhagadoda karata, parantu te loko kevi rite jo'i sake
ane jo ame icchata to temani jagya para ja temana modha badali deta, pachi na to te'o cali sakata ane na to pacha phari sakata
ane jene ame vrdvavastha'e la'i ja'i'e chi'e, tene balapana tarapha palatavi da'i'e chi'e, sum to pana te'o nathi samajata
na to ame te payagambarane sayari (kavita) sikhavadi ane na to temane te sobhe che, te to phakta sikhamana ane spasta kura'ana (ni ayato) che
jethi te'o, te dareka vyaktine saceta kari de je jivita che ane inkara karanara'o mate dalila sabita tha'i jaya
sum te'o jota nathi ke ame amara hatha vade banaveli vastu'o manthi temana mate dhoronum sarjana karyum, jena te'o malika tha'i gaya che
ane te dhorone ame temane adhina kari didha che, jemanthi ketalaka temani savari mate che ane ketalakanum mansa khaya che
te'one tenathi bija ghana phayada che ane piva mateni vastu'o, sum to (pana) te'o abhara vyakta nahim kare
ane te'o allahane chodine bijane pujya banave che, jethi te'oni madada karavamam ave
(jo ke) te'omam temani madada karavani sakti ja nathi, (parantu) to pana (musarika loko) temana mate hajara rahevavala sainiko banela che
basa! Tame temani vatothi nirasa na thaso, ame temani chupi ane jahera, dareka vatone jani'e chi'e
sum manavine etali pana khabara nathi ke ame tenum sarjana eka tipa vade karyum? Pachi tarata ja te khullo jhaghado karavavalo bani gayo
ane tene apana mate udaharana apyum ane potani janmane bhuli gayo, kaheva lagyo, a sadi gayela hadakamone kona jivita kari sakase
Tame javaba api do ke a hadakane te jivita karase, jene temanum sarjana prathama vara karyum hatum, je dareka prakarana sarjanane khuba sari rite jane che
te ja che, jene tamaram mate lilanchama vrkso manthi aga utpanna kari, jenathi tame tarata ja aga salagavo cho
jene akaso ane dharatinum sarjana karyum, sum te a loko jevanum sarjana nathi kari sakto? Ni:Sanka kari sake che ane te ja to, hikamatavalo, sarjaka (allaha) che
te jyare pana ko'i vastuni iccha kare che, tene etalum ja kahi de che ke, tha'i ja, to te, te ja samaye tha'i jaya che
basa! Pavitra che te allaha, jena hathamam dareka vastuni sampurna satta che ane jeni tarapha tame badha pacha pheravavamam avaso
soganda che la'inabandha ubha rahenara (pharista'o)na
pachi sampurna rite dhamaki apanara'ona
pachi allahana smaranamam vyasta rahenara'ona
ni:Sanka tamara sauno pujya eka ja che
akaso ane dharati ane te banne vacceni dareka vastu'o ane pasvimano palanahara te ja che
ame duniyana akasane tara'othi sanagaryum
ane vidrohi setanothi suraksa kari
mala'ul a-ala" (pharista'onum eka jutha)na pharista'one sambhalava mate te'o (setano) kana pana nathi lagavi sakata, parantu dareka bajuthi te'one maravamam ave che
bhagadava mate. Ane temana mate hammesa rahevavali yatana che
parantu je ko'i ekada vata sambhali le to (tarata ja) teni pachala salagelo angaro lagi jaya che
te inkara karanara'one savala karo ke tamarum sarjana karavum vadhare agharum che athava jemanum ame (temana uparanta) sarjana karyum? Ame (manavi'o)num sarjana cikani mati vade karyum
parantu tame asvarya pamo cho ane a loko maskari kari rahya che
Ane jyare temane sikhamana apavamam ave che, to a loko nathi manata
ane jyare ko'i camatkarane ju'e che to maskari kare che
ane kahe che ke a to khullu jadu che
sum jyare apane mrtyu pamisum ane mati tatha hadakam tha'i ja'isum, to sum pharivara apanane uthavavamam avase
sum apana pahelana purvajone pana
tame javaba api do ke ha-ha ane tame apamanita (pana) thaso
te to phakta eka sakhata jhatako che, acanaka te'o jova lagase
ane kahese ke haya amarum durbhagya! A ja badalano divasa che
a ja nirnayano divasa che jene tame juthalavata hata
